Guns of delusion: Who killed Charlie Kirk? America’s Second Amendment obstinacy
description: ​Yeats asked us to cast a cold eye on life and death. America prays, drowning in grief after every incident, but refuses to accept the simple truth: fewer guns will mean fewer deaths. That arithmetic is too much for a nation addicted to tragedy. Kirk had once argued that American campuses were no longer safe for people who held non-liberal views. He was right, when it came to debate. But it ​was the nation’s obstinacy that ultimately took a bright young man’s life. And in any sane nation, that shouldn’t be worth it.

However, SRT Sports Management clarified that Tendulkar is not being considered for the role.

description: The Emirates Cricket Board (ECB) dismissed reports of sluggish India-Pakistan ticket sales, confirming strong demand. An ECB official said 3,000 Platinum List tickets released online sold out within minutes, underlining the massive fan interest for Sunday’s high-stakes Dubai clash.

description: Authorities are actively searching for the gunman responsible for the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk, a prominent ally of Donald Trump, during a campus event at Utah Valley University. The attack, which Utah's governor has condemned as a political assassination, prompted a lockdown of the university as investigators scour for evidence. President Trump has vowed to find those responsible for the tragedy.

description: Former Pakistan captain Rashid Latif suggested India's easy agreement to play Pakistan in the Asia Cup has diminished the usual excitement surrounding the match. He contrasted this with past encounters where obstacles heightened anticipation, noting high ticket prices as a contributing factor to the subdued build-up. Despite this, he anticipated the match would gain momentum closer to the date.

title: Charlie Kirk killing: Assassin caught on cam? Shadowy figure seen on rooftop
description: Chilling footage has emerged, purportedly showing the assassin who fatally shot Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University. The video captures a dark figure on a rooftop moments after the shooting, as chaos erupted among the 3,000 attendees. Authorities are investigating the footage and searching for the rooftop shooter after Kirk was pronounced dead minutes later.

title: Gen Z group, army discuss roadmap for provisional government- Who will be interim PM
description: Following Prime Minister Oli's resignation amid protests, Gen Z protesters are in talks with Nepal's President and Army Chief to form an interim government. Chief Justice Sushila Karki, Kathmandu Mayor Balendra Shah, and others are being considered to lead the caretaker government, tasked with overseeing fresh elections. Discussions continue to navigate the political transition and maintain order.

description: At 31, his career ended in the most violent way possible. A sniper’s bullet struck him in the neck as he spoke to students at Utah Valley University. The rally turned into chaos. Within hours, Kirk was gone.

description: Hollywood actress Gabrielle Union spoke about managing money. She highlighted hospital expenses and insurance issues. Union mentioned her father's memory care costs. She also spoke about choosing roles based on financial needs. Dwyane Wade's net worth is $170 million. Gabrielle Union's net worth is $40 million. They share expenses equally. The couple has been together for over ten years.

title: Kawhi chose Clippers over Lakers to avoid LeBron and $28M payout
description: In 2019, Kawhi Leonard chose the Los Angeles Clippers over the Lakers. Reports suggest he avoided playing with LeBron James. He preferred being the main leader. Later, a controversy emerged regarding Leonard's deal with Aspiration. Allegations arose of a scheme to bypass the NBA salary cap. Steve Ballmer denied any involvement. The NBA is investigating the matter.
